valueProps.text: Start your project with a Postgres database, Authentication, instant APIs, Edge Functions, Realtime subscriptions, Storage, and Vector embeddings.
Every project is a full Postgres database, the world's most trusted relational database.
Easily write custom code without deploying or scaling servers.

proof: Logos: Mozilla, GitHub, 1Password, PwC, Pika, Humata, Udio, Langchain, Resend, Loops, Mobbin, Gopuff, Chatbase, Betashares, Submagic

facts.text: Supabase is the Postgres development platform.
facts.evidence: Supabase is the Postgres development platform.

facts.text: Supabase offers a Postgres database, Authentication, instant APIs, Edge Functions, Realtime subscriptions, Storage, and Vector embeddings.
facts.evidence: Start your project with a Postgres database, Authentication, instant APIs, Edge Functions, Realtime subscriptions, Storage, and Vector embeddings.

facts.text: Supabase's primary call to action is 'Start your project'.
Supabase is trusted by fast-growing companies worldwide.
Every project is a full Postgres database.
facts.evidence: Every project is a full Postgres database, the world's most trusted relational database.

facts.text: Supabase offers built-in authentication with Row Level Security.
facts.evidence: Add user sign ups and logins, securing your data with Row Level Security.

facts.text: Supabase allows storing, organizing, and serving large files.
facts.evidence: Store, organize, and serve large files, from videos to images.

facts.text: Supabase provides real-time data synchronization for multiplayer experiences.
facts.evidence: Build multiplayer experiences with real-time data synchronization.

facts.text: Supabase's Edge Functions allow writing custom code without deploying or scaling servers.
facts.evidence: Easily write custom code without deploying or scaling servers.

facts.text: Supabase's website includes a pricing page.
